des: "This wonderful dish combines all your favorite vegetables in one dish that can be adapted to your own tastes.  If preparing a day ahead, refrigerate, then stir in 1/2 cup additional Italian dressing before serving.  Also terrific with Ranch, Caesar, Red Wine Vinaigrette, Parmesan, and most other dressings!"
ins:
Cook pasta according to package directions.  Drain, and rinse with cold water until completely cool.
In large bowl, combine pasta, vegetables, cheese, and olives.  Toss well with dressing.  Serve chilled or at room temperature.
